Phrase.Text: Make us a good offer and perhaps we'll lend you a hand. Attempt to take our worlds and death is all you'll claim.
Dread Lord forces hold a 98.87 kill percentage. Newly developed Korath Spore vessels hold a 99.36 rate of invasion. Likelihood of failure is 37:2. Calculations predict a formidable engagement.
Your plight seems hopeless, but we hope you overcome your adversaries and plot a new moral course.
The Dark Arnor will be difficult to defeat with the Korath as their pawns. Strike without mercy, for you shall receive none in return.
